data.name: The Scam - More Scams Pack
data.detailed_description:
Did you ever want to get scammed even more? You're weird but this dlc is for you!
Featuring 10+ more scams to be found in the game at random! As well as an increased occurrence to find more scams as well as an increased max scam limit.

Discover the sneakret of the boxer alien! Who knows what he wants?
Try Wizard of Gazoo now!
There are also cats myaaaaa!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.80 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 5500
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 48 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek HD Audio
  • Additional Notes: Pretty much any computer will do.

package_groups.title: Buy The Scam - More Scams Pack
